reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We Stayed 2 non consecutive nights at hotel Lirico in April 2012. Based on other Tripadvisor reviews we chose to stay at Hotel Lirico in Rome due to it's close proximity to the train station and it's reasonable cost, however were uncertain of what standard the hotel would be.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised, super clean and friendly!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well, we were very pleasantly surprised by the overall standard! We had two different rooms as we left on a road trip and then stayed a second night on our return, and the cleanliness and room standard experienced both times was excellent.
reviews.title: Do NOT stay here! Worst hotel EVER!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The only thing to be aware of is there is no elevator from the street level to reach the reception floor and it is quite the steep set of stairs with heavy luggage. Our second night stay there was a staff member to assist us which we gave a well earned tip for... our bags were very heavy!
reviews.title: A fantastic break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is an elevator from the reception level to reach your room / floor.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We found the reception staff extremely helpful and friendly, recommending suitable local restaurants which we really enjoyed and assisting with directions etc.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Clean and comfortable and just a few blocks from the main Rome train station for a reasonable price. What did you expect for this price in downtown Rome?
reviews.title: Good hotel in a great location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes you do have to carry your bags up a flight of stairs to the lobby and the elevator was small, but the beds were firm, the a/c worked well, the rooms were big enough, and the service was good. Breakfast was fine and there are many good tourist restaurants within a few blocks.
reviews.title: Good location but thats it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The Termini metro station was a 5+ minute walk away - our only gripe was that the cold water pressure in the bathroom sink sometimes evaporated; hot water pressure in the shower was never an issue.
reviews.title: Great hotel and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: If travelling back to Rome again for tourism we would stay here again!
reviews.title: Good Location and Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: If you have any issues with mobility this is not the hotel for you. You have to carry your suitcases up very steep stairs to get to the elevator and back down. There was no help offered or available.The front desk people were very polite and breakfast was average. The location is right on a main strip so you can walk to shopping and restaurants and its not too far from the metro.The rooms are dark and there are no drawers to put your clothes but this is not uncommon. You do have to use the room key to keep the lights on but again not uncommon in Italy. Just ask for an extra key if you need to.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, clean and really central

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic stay at the Lirico, just accross the Opera is a great hotel, the staff is great, the rooms are beautifully decorated and very comfortable, Tony at the front desk is wonderful. Breakfast is nice and plentiful to get you started.
reviews.title: Best three stars option in Termini area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed at the Lirico hotel for 4 nights. Nice hotel and good location. Very close to the metro station. When you get there, you'll see a huge flight of stairs but it wasn't an issue for us. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Our room had air conditioner so heating wasn't a problem.
reviews.title: friendly staff, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was good: cakes, bread, croissants, cheese, cold meats ,eggs, different types of juice, milk, tea and coffee. The best part was that the breakfast ladies would make you any type of coffee beverage (macchiato,cappuccino,espresso, etc.).
reviews.title: lirico hotel rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was also very friendly. Tony was the gentleman we'd see in the evening after a long day of sightseeing. He'd recommend local restaurants and answer any of our questions about what to visit and how to get there. I'd also like to mention the breakfast ladies, in particular the lady from Cabo Verde- So nice!
reviews.title: great stay at the Lirico

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: I would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: fantastic stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found this
reviews.title: Good Hotel in fairly central area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: hotel on Trip Advisor the welcome was excellent from Tony the front office manager and nothing was a problem from advice to dining and both reccomendations were excellent to every day assistance
reviews.title: DO NOT STAY HERE...HORRID

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: easy for the hop on hop off bus route
reviews.title: A ROMAN ADVENTURE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bathroom a little small but is good for the 3 s s s
reviews.title: Great Service !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: There is a porter available for the stairs
reviews.title: Lovely place to stay!
